name: Reductive Order
description:
"[...] it is important that for every one new regulation issued, at least two prior regulations be identified for elimination [...]"

"[...] whenever an [...] agency publicly proposes for notice and comment [...] a new regulation, it shall identify at least two existing regulations to be repealed [...]"

- Presidential Executive Order on Reducing Regulation and Controlling Regulatory Costs, January 30th, 2017

It is the year 2070. The federal government has only twenty-four really wacky regulations left. You are the Reductive Order, a group of corrupt politicians, bought and paid for by lobbyists. Will you succeed in your goals?

The Reductive Order always succeeds.

https://infernocloud.github.io/game-jam-2017/

Reductive Order was developed for the 2017 February ICT Game Jam by Michael Neth, Andrew Siegman, and Ben Blankley
